trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> objects that are selected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> objekter som er valgt i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The order of columns in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på kolonnene i samlingen garanteres ikke til å samsvare med rekkefølgen som de er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection does not perform efficiently when working with large numbers of columns.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection utfører ikke effektivt når du arbeider med høyt antall kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls will not contain enough columns for this to be an issue, but if you are working with large numbers of columns, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine if the entire grid is selected, or you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the number of selected columns (or the number of columns in a specified state).
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>inneholder kontrollene ikke nok kolonner til dette er et problem, men hvis du arbeider med store antall kolonner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>å avgjøre om hele rutenettet velges, eller du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å bestemme antall merkede kolonner (eller antall kolonner i en tilstand som er angitt).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er relevante for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>klasse direkte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Fjerne den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Alltid et.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified column is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte kolonnen finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the dataGridViewColumn parameter is in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis den dataGridViewColumn parameteren er i samlingen; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer av elementene i samlingen til den angitte matrisen, med Start fra den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Endimensjonal matrise som er målet for elementene kopieres fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen må ha nullbasert indeksering.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Starter den nullbaserte indeksen i matrisen på som kopiering.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayer flerdimensjonal.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - eller - antallet elementer i den er større enn den tilgjengelige plassen fra index til slutten av array.

trans-unit.source: The cannot be cast automatically to the type of array.
trans-unit.target: Den automatisk kan ikke endres til typen array .

trans-unit.source: Inserts a column into the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn en kolonne i samlingen fra den angitte posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er relevante for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>klasse direkte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To insert a column into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Å sette inn en kolonne i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the column should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som kolonnen skal settes inn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> å sette inn den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Alltid et.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>klasse direkte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To remove a column from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Fjerne kolonnen fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
